In Yemen, at least 46 people are dead after two suicide bombings...
In Afghanistan, a mob beats a woman to death before burning her body...
...and tossing it into a river for allegedly setting a Quran on fire.
In India, 15 people are dead after three cars from a train derail...
In the US, President Barack Obama sends greetings to Iranians for Persian New Year,...
And finally from Myanmar, the first round-the-world solar flight ends its third leg...
